c74object.name: vgreaterthan~
c74object.description:
vgreaterthan~ provides a CPU efficient version of greaterthan~ using SIMD operations.
vgreaterthan~ outputs a 1 signal when the left input is greater-than the right input and a 0 when it is less-than or equal-to the right input. The right input can be a signal or a float.

objarg.name: initial-comparison-value
objarg.description: Sets an initial comparison value for the signal coming into the left inlet. 1 is sent out if the signal is greater than the argument; otherwise, 0 is sent out. If a signal is connected to the right inlet, the argument is ignored. If no argument is present, and no signal is connected to the right inlet, the initial value is 0 by default.

method.name: int
method.digest: Compare value with left input signal
method.description: In right inlet: A number to be used for comparison with the signal coming into the left inlet. If a signal is also connected to the right inlet, a float or int is ignored.

method.name: float
method.digest: Compare value with left input signal
method.description: In right inlet: A number to be used for comparison with the signal coming into the left inlet. If a signal is also connected to the right inlet, a float or int is ignored.

method.name: signal
method.description:
In left inlet: The signal is compared to a signal coming into the right inlet, or a constant value received in the right inlet. If it is greater than the value in the right inlet, 1 is sent out; otherwise, 0 is sent out.
In right inlet: The signal is used for comparison with the signal coming into the left inlet.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: If the signal in the left inlet is greater than the value in the right inlet, 1 is sent out; otherwise, 0 is sent out.
